layout.singingstanza: The Bi -- ble is God's breath; the es -- sence of His Per -- son. God's speak -- ing out through man; borne by the Ho -- ly Spir -- it. The Bi -- ble is God's speak -- ing in the proph -- ets and the Son; The Bi -- ble is the Ho -- ly Spir -- it's rev -- e -- la -- tion.

lyrics.stanza: The Bible is God's breath; the essence of His Person. God's speaking out through man; borne by the Holy Spirit. The Bible is God's speaking in the prophets and the Son; The Bible is the Holy Spirit's revelation.
